params.user: the address of user claiming fees
params.wavaxAmountClaimed: amount of wavax fees that were claimed

GLPMint(address,bytes32,uint256,uint256,.details: emitted after a GLP token mint

params.tokenToMintWith: token which GLP was minted with
params.tokenToMintWithAmount: amount of token used to mint GLP
params.user: the address of user minting GLP

GLPRedemption(address,bytes32,uint256,ui.details: emitted after a GLP token redemption

params.redeemedToken: token which GLP was redeemed into
params.user: the address of user redeeming GLP
